title: Arms Dealer v11
description:
"As a new arms dealer in the year 2025 you will bribe generals, build relationships, and trade over 300 real weapons. Hunted by 4 law enforcement agencies and compete with the top 10 arms dealers. You must find the best deals, rarest weapons and most useful vehicles to carry your goods."

v11 changelog (29.10.2014):
- Agency 1 is now active at the start which also allows The Bounty Hunters and The APA to become active later in game.
- Sell price will now update after each weapon sell.
- Updated pathfinding so traveling will take a shorter trip to and through countries and prevent impossible travel challenges.
- Updated travel challenge distances and now have a leaderboard for the hardest challenges beaten.
- Added button to hide story on story messages.
- Can now press double escape to close all menus instead of escape only closing one at a time.
- The world is no longer flat. Includes trans Pacific pathfinding, display, and travel challenges
- Included Buy, Sell, and Ship maximum buttons.
- Added several new sounds and ambient noises when zoomed in to locations on the map.
- Added option box on sell screen to only display items you have on you.
- Can now press the enter key while travel planning a private transport to move the menu back to the center of screen and begin the loading process.
- Can now right click to remove a node and every node after it in a travel planned path.
- Messages will now display for bribing a transport, canceling a bribed transport, and being unable to afford the bribe of a loaded departing transport.
- Added a dropdown box for selecting resolution in addition to the input box for common resolutions as well as being able to use custom resolutions.
- Added an option to help the player view the travel challenge in the travel planner.
- You will now automatically travel with your yacht to the last location when it is selected as your private transport to travel.
- Fixed a problem with agency ships never departing on a load game.
- Adjusted difficulties of all travel challenges.
- Fixed crash when game difficulty was harder than easy.
